name: Frost Servant
behaviour: Frost Servants chase their opponent and try to obstruct them from defeating their master, [[Zushuka]].
location: [[Ice Witch Temple]], second floor, in the centre when [[Zushuka]] has spawned.
strategy: There is no reason to kill Frost Servants unless they are blocking your path to the ice pillar or the altar. You must kill [[Zushuka]] to stop the Frost Servants from spawning. You can use [[Energy Wall Rune]]s to stop the Frost Servants from blocking you while you destroy the pillars. For more, see the strategy of [[Zushuka]].
